page.title: 12Drury Lane/Bow St 05300181
page.content: The London Weather Centre can be found on the south side of{High Holborn}just before Chancery Lane. In the centre of {Southampton Row} is a reminder of the days when trams ran in London - the gates led to a tram terminus and the tracks can still be seen at the top of the entrance. The{SW}sector known as St Giles attracts many visitors mainly due to the entertainment that can be found there, eg. The Aldwych and New London theatres in{Drury Lane.}The world of ballet and opera is represented by the world famous Royal Opera House in{Bow Street}- the Royal Ballet and Royal Opera both appear here. Just opposite is Bow Street Police Station and the Magistrates Courts. Off{Kingsway} to the west are the white, circular offices of the CAA (Civil Aviation Authority). {Continued....
